      24             : /**
      25             :  * This structure is used to store information logged by various gecko
      26             :  * components for later examination by test code.
      27             :  * It consists of a bucket for every paint (initiated on the client side),
      28             :  * and every repaint request (initiated on the compositor side by
      29             :  * AsyncPanZoomController::RequestContentRepait), which are identified by
      30             :  * sequence numbers, and within that, a set of arbitrary string key/value
      31             :  * pairs for every scrollable frame, identified by a scroll id.
      32             :  * There are two instances of this data structure for every content thread:
      33             :  * one on the client side and one of the compositor side.
      34             :  */
